column4: Has anyone else had strange things occur with the mounting and unmounting of floppy drives?  If so, did you get the thing solved?  How did you solve it?
Yes they some people still do own the damned things.
hmm, you got any friends with floppy drives?

well, if you really need that file I would try asking them to get it off for you. I honestly dont know how to get linux to see it. Have you tried describing your problem in ##linux? they got my MMC reader working.
